attributes.additional_details:
Reduce duty which is paid on fuel across the UK to come into line with the rest of the EU. The UK is one of the highest payers of duty in the whole of the EU if not the world. THIS MUST STOP. In one litre of petrol or diesel, over 50% of this is taxes and fuel duty.

Reduce fuel duty and keep it flexible in order to keep the price of fuel to a maximum of £1 per litre.
